podcast.name: Plays Well with Others
podcast.description: From Creative Commons, a podcast about the art and science of collaboration. With a focus on the tools, techniques, and mechanics of collaboration, we explore how today's most interesting collaborators are making new things, solving old problems, and getting things done — together. Hosted by Creative Commons CEO Ryan Merkley.

podcast_episode.title: Coming Soon
podcast_episode.name: Coming Soon
podcast_episode.description: <p>From Creative Commons, a new podcast about the art and science of collaboration. With a focus on the tools, techniques, and mechanics of collaboration, we’re going to explore how today's most interesting collaborators are making new things, solving old problems, and getting things done — together. Hosted by Creative Commons CEO Ryan Merkley. Premieres Tuesday, February 19.</p>

podcast.name: Trace
podcast.description: An investigative podcast hosted by ABC journalist Rachael Brown, Trace examines the fractures in Australia's criminal justice system, and the decades-long ripples they have caused.
podcast.copyright: Copyright 2025, Australian Broadcasting Corporation. All right reserved.

podcast_episode.title: S1 BONUS | A million-dollar reward
podcast_episode.name: S1 BONUS | A million-dollar reward
podcast_episode.description: <p>Victoria Police is set to announce a one million dollar reward for information that finally solves the case of Maria James, who was murdered in the back of her bookshop 44 years ago. And for the first time in seven years of investigating this case, police grant an interview to Rachael Brown.</p>

podcast_episode.title: S1 Bonus | Maria James inquest finding
podcast_episode.name: S1 Bonus | Maria James inquest finding
podcast_episode.description: <p>A Victorian Coroner has failed to name a killer in the 1980 cold case of Maria James. Her sons are devastated. But there's still hope, in leads yet to be chased by police.</p>

podcast_episode.title: S1 Bonus | The Inquest
podcast_episode.name: S1 Bonus | The Inquest
podcast_episode.description: <p>The new coronial inquest into the murder of Maria James has wrapped up. Will the Coroner be able to name her killer? And of the police exhibits that haven't disappeared, what DNA testing can be done? This episode nears us closer to the end of the James brothers' 41-year-fight for answers for their mum.</p>

podcast_episode.title: S1 Bonus | Breakthrough in Maria James cold case
podcast_episode.name: S1 Bonus | Breakthrough in Maria James cold case
podcast_episode.description: <p>The discovery of a police exhibit - thought to be missing for around three decades - could finally help unmask the killer in the 1980 cold case of Maria James.</p>

podcast_episode.title: S2 BONUS The Price
podcast_episode.name: S2 BONUS The Price
podcast_episode.description: <p>The Royal Commission has released its final report into defence lawyer turned police informer Nicola Gobbo.</p>

podcast_episode.title: S2 08 | End game
podcast_episode.name: S2 08 | End game
podcast_episode.description: <p>We reveal the story of Nicola Gobbo's audacious bid to return to Australia.</p>

podcast_episode.title: S2 07 | Reckoning
podcast_episode.name: S2 07 | Reckoning
podcast_episode.description: <p>Everything unravels, for Nicola Gobbo and Victoria Police. Their secret is out.</p>

podcast_episode.title: S2 06 | Whatever it takes
podcast_episode.name: S2 06 | Whatever it takes
podcast_episode.description: <p>Nicola hits rock bottom, but Victoria Police wants her to take on a new role ... as a witness.</p>

podcast_episode.title: S2 05 | Glittering prize
podcast_episode.name: S2 05 | Glittering prize
podcast_episode.description: <p>Nicola wants to be the best source ever, and she leads police to the biggest target of all: the mafia. Her double life is getting riskier, but she can't stop. This episode charts an addiction and a crash.</p>

podcast_episode.title: S2 04 | Rubicon
podcast_episode.name: S2 04 | Rubicon
podcast_episode.description: <p>Nicola crosses the point of no return and becomes a police informer. She'll represent clients, while passing on the underworld's secrets to Victoria Police.</p>

podcast_episode.title: S2 03 | The darkest night
podcast_episode.name: S2 03 | The darkest night
podcast_episode.description: <p>A drug house burglary smells of police corruption and a police informer is executed.</p>

podcast_episode.title: S2 02 | One of the crew
podcast_episode.name: S2 02 | One of the crew
podcast_episode.description: <p>As the gangland war explodes, both police and criminals start questioning Nicola's allegiances. Where do her loyalties lie?</p>

podcast_episode.title: S2 01 | Nicola
podcast_episode.name: S2 01 | Nicola
podcast_episode.description: <p>We meet Nicola Gobbo in a secret location, in hiding, now that her double life as a police informer is out, and she begins telling us her full story.</p>

podcast_episode.title: INTRODUCING Trace season 2 - The Informer
podcast_episode.name: INTRODUCING Trace season 2 - The Informer
podcast_episode.description: <p>Lawyer Nicola Gobbo represented some of Australia's most dangerous criminals, all the while secretly working as a police informer. Why did she do it?</p>

podcast_episode.title: S1 07 | Hope
podcast_episode.name: S1 07 | Hope
podcast_episode.description: <p>More than a year on from their plea for a new coronial inquest, the James brothers get a decision.</p><p>Will they finally get answers to the burning questions they've carried for 38 years about the murder of their mother?</p><p>And what about those items Trace has been given that might have DNA on them?</p><p>Can they identify the killer?</p><p>We take them to one of the world's best DNA labs, with some of the most sensitive equipment, to find out.</p>

podcast_episode.title: S1 06 | Limbo
podcast_episode.name: S1 06 | Limbo
podcast_episode.description: <p>New evidence has been found. So can police test it for a trace of the killer? What happened to crucial documents? And a new confession.</p><p>It is nearly a year since the James brothers applied for a new coronial inquest into their mum's murder, but the case hangs in legal limbo. </p>

podcast_episode.title: S1 05 | Wait
podcast_episode.name: S1 05 | Wait
podcast_episode.description: <p>The fall-out from major revelations in the Maria James cold-case continue, as her sons make a desperate plea to the Coroner. </p>

podcast_episode.title: S1 04 | DNA
podcast_episode.name: S1 04 | DNA
podcast_episode.description: <p>There's a major break in the case, as Trace uncovers a police bungle in the murder of Maria James. But it only serves to throw up more questions than answers, as the James brothers continue their desperate search for justice.</p>

podcast_episode.title: S1 03 | Sins
podcast_episode.name: S1 03 | Sins
podcast_episode.description: <p>A second person of interest emerges within the church. Rachael Brown investigates their past and discovers a dark and disturbing history. </p>

podcast_episode.title: BONUS | How your leads are helping the investigation
podcast_episode.name: BONUS | How your leads are helping the investigation
podcast_episode.description: <p>Since Trace was first released, the ABC has received over 50 emails from the community with leads and tip offs. In this bonus update, reporter Rachael Brown follows up with two women who got in touch to say they saw men acting suspiciously around Maria's bookshop at the time of her murder. Send us your tips: <a href="mailto:trace@abc.net.au">trace@abc.net.au</a></p>

podcast_episode.title: S1 02 | Confessions
podcast_episode.name: S1 02 | Confessions
podcast_episode.description: <p>Rachael Brown's investigation into the death of Maria James turns to the local Church, and Rachael tracks down a new witness who saw someone covered in blood around the time of Maria's death.</p>

podcast_episode.title: S1 01 | Bookshop murder
podcast_episode.name: S1 01 | Bookshop murder
podcast_episode.description: <p>On a winter morning in June 1980, Maria James turned to her son Mark and looked him in the eyes. "If anything happens to me, look after your brother." Later that day she was found stabbed to death at the back of her suburban Melbourne bookshop. </p>

podcast_episode.title: INTRODUCING: Trace, series 1 Bookshop Murder
podcast_episode.name: INTRODUCING: Trace, series 1 Bookshop Murder
podcast_episode.description: <p>June, 1980, suburban Melbourne: Mother of two Maria James is stabbed to death in the back of her bookshop. Her killer has never been found. Was it a scorned lover? A random stranger? Or was Maria's murder tied up in the sins of the Catholic Church?</p>
